ComicInfo.Title: The Secret Revealed
ComicInfo.Summary: The Secret Revealed: Shadowhawk tracks down and battles the violent vigilante whom he inspired. When Hawk's Shadow begins to spout racial slurs, Shadowhawk finally takes off his mask and reveals himself to be Paul Johnstone, an African American man. The police call in a bounty hunter to take down Shadowhawk.
